abstract: The fourth game of the A.L.C.S. was filled with intriguing decisions.
snippet: The fourth game of the A.L.C.S. was filled with intriguing decisions.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT - The fourth game of the American League Championship Series started more than two hours late, and it stretched across 4 hours and 11 innings. But it was all worth it -- for the Texas Rangers, who beat the Detroit Tigers, 7-3, and for people who are fascinated by baseball strategy.
